    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>eun</catalog>
            <entry>15541</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="it">Filosofi Europei</string>
            <string language="en">European Philosophers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Europäische Philosophen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Philosophes Européens</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Filósofos Europeus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ευρωπαϊκοί φιλόσοφοι</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Filósofos Europeos</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="it">Un quiz sui più famosi filosofi d'Europa. Il quiz è stato realizzato con il Power Point ed è basato sul celebre gioco "Chi vuol essere milionario"?</string>
            <string language="en">A PowerPoint quiz, based on the well-known game "Who wants to be a millionaire", about famous European philosophers.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein PowerPoint Quiz, basiert auf dem weithin 
bekannten Spiel "wer ein Millionaire sein möchte", über berühmte 
europäische Philosophen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un jeu de PowerPoint, basé sur le jeu bien connu
"qui veut être un millionnaire", au sujet des philosophes européens 
célèbres.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um quiz de PowerPoint, baseado no jogo well-known 
"quem quer ser um millionaire", sobre filósofos europeus famosos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένας διαγωνισμός γνώσεων PowerPoint, βασισμένος στο
γνωστό παιχνίδι "ποιος θέλει να είναι εκατομμυριούχοσ", για τους 
διάσημους ευρωπαϊκούς φιλοσόφους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un concurso de PowerPoint, basado en el juego bien
conocido "quién desea ser un millonario", sobre filósofos europeos 
famosos.</string>
          </description>
        </general>
